title: Ess怎么取消禁用物品
txt_content: 服务器禁用了盔甲架，Ess怎么取消禁用啊，服务器没装banitem

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
ess禁用物品的话
应该在config.yml
盔甲架的ID应该是416 默认是不被禁用的
blacklist:

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from placing?
    placement: 10,11,46,327

    # Which items should people be prevented from using?
    usage: 327

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from breaking?
    break:

    # Which blocks should not be pushed by pistons?
    piston:

    # Which blocks should not be dispensed by dispensers
    dispenser:复制代码

replies.author: 暗影月赎
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-461014-1-1.html
这里有ESS插件详细的配置解读
